data.title: Shriners International on LinkedIn: #shriners #history #hollywood #haroldlloyd #shriners150 #trivia
data.meta_description: Harold Lloyd was an actor, comedian and stunt performer who appeared in many silent comedy films and “talkies” from 1914–1947. He also served as the 1949–1950…
data.text:
We’re looking for speakers for our 2025 educational programs! Are you passionate about the empowerment of others? Do you have innovative insights, groundbreaking strategies, or transformative frameworks to share? We invite you to submit your presentation proposal for consideration for Shriners International Education Foundation’s 2025 education and programming. https://ow.ly/TWEN50SfGMT

We commend our Regional Membership Directors for their exceptional contributions. When asked about insights contributing to membership success, RMD Brad Prout, P.P., shared, "Shrine Centers embracing new Noble creation at stated meetings are thriving! It's all about fresh perspectives and engagement. Looking back at 2023, seeing growth in the first half motivates me. With dedication and clear messaging, we are turning the tide for Shriners International!" https://ow.ly/y5mp50SF6He

Volunteer registration is now open for the 2024 Shriners Children's Open! This is your chance to play a key role in one of Shriners Children's signature events. Don't miss the opportunity to join us behind the scenes and make a difference for a great cause. Sign up now to secure your spot. This is a perfect opportunity for Shriners, clubs, and units to volunteer together. https://ow.ly/7vgt50R8NhE #Volunteer #CharityGolf #LasVegas

Women Impacting Care, chaired by Shriners International’s First Lady, is a thoughtful group of women donors, supporters and advocates who have bonded together to help highlight services and programs of Shriners Children’s. This year, First Lady Judy Burke has chosen to focus on Shriners Children’s mission to provide life-changing care to children with burns through her program, “On Angels’ Wings." Learn how you can support her program at https://ow.ly/OHSb50SvyGs

We’re looking for speakers for our 2025 educational programs! Are you passionate about the empowerment of others? Do you have innovative insights, groundbreaking strategies, or transformative frameworks to share? We invite you to submit your presentation proposal for consideration for Shriners International Education Foundation’s 2024 education and programming. We’re looking for speakers for our 2025 educational programs! https://lnkd.in/efqEguzF

An active Mason and Legacy Shriner, Daniel Oglesby is currently the president of his shrine club, a past Master of Alamo Lodge 164, and remains involved with many activities within Al Chymia Shriners, his Blue Lodge, Scottish and York Rite, and OES. He believes that highlighting the fun of the fraternity and its philanthropic work is key to attracting new members who will be engaged with the fraternity and enthusiastic about the charitable aspects of being a Shriner. He plans to continue his dedicated service and ultimately run for a position on the Al Chymia Divan. Read more #ShrinersNextGen spotlights at https://ow.ly/qUkJ50SzHPr #Shriners #fraternity #Freemasonry

The Award of Merit, created in 1996, is given out by the Imperial Potentate to Shriners who have made an outstanding and lasting impact on Shriners International and Shriners Children's. Congratulations to this year's honorees: RJ "Jody" Meguiar, Egypt Shriners J. "Hut" Hutson, El Zaribah Shriners James D. Cole, 33°, Sovereign Grand Commander & SGIG at Large, Scottish Rite, SJ; Kazim Shriners Wiliam A. "Bill" Garrard, Jr, El Zaribah Shriners Michael J. Fox, Kerak Shriners
